sql.statement: CREATE TABLE user_profile_ext(profile_id TEXT NOT NULL,param_id TEXT NOT NULL,param_name TEXT NOT NULL,param_value TEXT,enabled NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,CONSTRAINT PK_user_profile_ext PRIMARY KEY (profile_id, param_id));

CREATE TABLE user_device(profile_id TEXT,app_id TEXT,app_version TEXT,app_version_number INTEGER,model TEXT,device_name TEXT,system_name TEXT,system_version TEXT,language TEXT,country TEXT,carrier_name TEXT,mcc TEXT,mnc TEXT,network TEXT,CONSTRAINT PK_user_device PRIMARY KEY (profile_id),CONSTRAINT FK_user_device_user_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id)REFERENCES user_profile(profile_id));
